org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
echo install wifi firmware apt-get -y install firmware-realtek || sleep 200 && apt-get -y install firmware-realtek || exit 1
echo Build/install LCD drivers # this needs some optimization.. it takes 90MB apt-get -y -q install device-tree-compiler || exit 1 cd ~/chaipcr/modules/LCDtouch_V3/49 chmod 775 install_debian.sh
mkdir -p /boot/dts/ mkdir -p /lib/firmware/
./install_debian.sh || exit 1 if [ -e /root/chaipcr/deploy/setup_touchcontroller.sh ] then echo "Setting up touch driver" /root/chaipcr/deploy/setup_touchcontroller.sh fi
if $is_dev then echo Building a debug image else apt-get -y -q --purge autoremove device-tree-compiler rm -r /root/chaipcr/modules 2> /dev/null rm -r /root/chaipcr/deploy/overlay 2> /dev/null fi
modprobe -i tilcdc || exit 1 echo done installing LCD driver.
sync sync fsck /dev/mmcblk1p1 -y -f fsck /dev/mmcblk0p1 -y -f
exit 0
